source.tableCreateSQL:
CREATE TABLE `report_performance` (
        `COM_ID` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
        `STORAGE_ID` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
        `OPER_ID` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
        `OPER_TYPE` int(11) NOT NULL,
        `REPORT_HOUR` int(11) NOT NULL,
        `REPORT_DATE` date NOT NULL,
        `TRADE_COUNT` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
        `ORDER_COUNT` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
        `GOODS_COUNT` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
        `CREDITS_AMOUNT` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
        `total_price` decimal(19,4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0000',
        `operate_order_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
        `pick_up_order_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
        `put_away_order_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
        `CREATE_TIME` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
        `MODIFY_TIME` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
        UNIQUE KEY `IDX_UNQ` (`STORAGE_ID`,`OPER_ID`,`REPORT_DATE`,`OPER_TYPE`,`REPORT_HOUR`),
        KEY `IDX_COM` (`COM_ID`),
        KEY `IDX_CREATE_TIME` (`CREATE_TIME`),
        KEY `IDX_MODIFY_TIME` (`MODIFY_TIME`)
        ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
